question: Which state has been ranked first in the list of India's top 10 States for Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED)?
explanation:
The US-based leading certification agency, Green Business Certification Inc. recently released the list of India\'s top 10 States for Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED). Maharashtra has been ranked at the top spot among the states, in the global green building rating system. The building which obtained the rating has low carbon emissions.
The system ranks Indian states in terms of cumulative gross square meters (GSM) of space, certified by the LEED system. Maharashtra has attained over one crore GSM development and retains its first position for the second year, followed by Karnataka, Haryana, Tamil Nadu and Uttar Pradesh.
